meta.title: About Us
meta.description: Discover the story behind Catalog Studio and our mission to transform restaurant menus.

hero.title: Transforming how restaurants showcase their menus
hero.subtitle: We created Catalog Studio to give restaurants the power to present their cuisine in the best possible way - without the technical headaches.

problem.title: The Challenge
problem.description: The restaurant industry moves fast. Customers expect seamless digital experiences, and competition is fiercer than ever. Printed menus are expensive to update, QR codes often lead to ugly PDFs, and complex platforms eat up your valuable time.

solution.title: Our Solution
solution.description: We built a platform that lets you create a professional digital menu in minutes and update it instantly from anywhere. We don't replace the traditional experience ‚Äì we enhance it. Your customers get a beautiful showcase of your cuisine, while you gain complete control and save time and money.

vision.title: The Vision
vision.description: We envision a future where every restaurant, from food trucks to fine dining, has the tools to stay competitive in the digital age ‚Äì without sacrificing the charm and authenticity of the traditional dining experience.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Technology should be intuitive. We build tools anyone can use, without steep learning curves or complicated manuals.

speed.title: Speed
speed.description: Your time is valuable. Our platform is built for speed - from initial setup to daily menu updates.

beauty.title: Beauty
beauty.description: Your menu deserves to look great. We provide beautifully designed, professional templates that make your food stand out.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: Your customers depend on your menu. We build rock-solid infrastructure that works 24/7, so you don't have to worry.

tech.title: Built with modern technology
tech.subtitle: We use the best tools to deliver a fast, secure, and scalable experience.

switch.question: Can I switch plans later?
switch.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

limit.question: What happens when I reach my product limit?
limit.answer: You'll be notified when you're approaching your limit. You can either upgrade to a higher plan or remove some products to stay within your current limit.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment, no questions asked.

domain.question: Can I use my own domain?
domain.answer: Yes! Basic and Premium plans include custom domain support. You can connect your own domain (e.g., menu.yourrestaurant.com).

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and process payments securely through Stripe.

setup.question: Is there a setup fee?
setup.answer: No setup fees, ever. You only pay the monthly or annual subscription price for your chosen plan.

meta.title: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions
meta.description: Find answers to common questions about Catalog Studio, our features, pricing, and support.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Catalog Studio. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

whatIs.question: What is Catalog Studio?
whatIs.answer: Catalog Studio is a modern digital menu platform designed for restaurants. It allows you to create, manage, and share beautiful online menus with your customers. Customers can view your menu by scanning a QR code or visiting your unique restaurant URL - no app download required.

howWorks.question: How does Catalog Studio work?
howWorks.answer: It's simple! Sign up, create your restaurant profile, add your menu items with photos and descriptions, customize your menu's appearance, and share it with customers via QR code or URL. Updates you make are instantly reflected on your live menu.

whoFor.question: Who is Catalog Studio for?
whoFor.answer: Catalog Studio is perfect for any food service business: restaurants, caf√©s, food trucks, bars, bakeries, and more. Whether you're a small family restaurant or managing multiple locations, we have a plan that fits your needs.

languages.question: What languages are supported?
languages.answer: Catalog Studio supports multiple languages including English and Romanian. You can create menus in different languages to serve international customers, and the platform interface is also available in multiple languages.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free plan?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! We offer a free plan that includes 1 restaurant/menu, up to 20 products, 2 templates, and basic features. It's perfect for small restaurants or to test the platform. You can upgrade anytime as your needs grow.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) and process payments securely through Stripe. We offer both monthly and annual billing options, with savings on annual plans.

cancelAnytime.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
cancelAnytime.answer: Absolutely! There are no long-term contracts. You can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. If you cancel, you'll have access to your paid features until the end of your billing period.

refunds.question: What is your refund policy?
refunds.answer: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied with Catalog Studio for any reason, contact us within 14 days of your purchase for a full refund, no questions asked.

updateMenu.question: Can I update my menu anytime?
updateMenu.answer: Yes! One of the key benefits of Catalog Studio is instant updates. You can add, edit, or remove menu items, change prices, update descriptions, and upload new photos at any time. Changes are reflected immediately on your live menu.

qrCode.question: How do QR codes work?
qrCode.answer: We generate a unique QR code for your restaurant menu. You can download and print this QR code to place on tables, at entrances, or on promotional materials. When customers scan it with their phone camera, they're instantly taken to your menu.

multipleRestaurants.question: Can I manage multiple restaurants?
multipleRestaurants.answer: Yes! Depending on your plan, you can manage multiple restaurants from a single account. The Basic plan includes up to 3 restaurants, and the Premium plan offers unlimited restaurants - perfect for restaurant groups or chains.

customDomain.question: Can I use my own domain name?
customDomain.answer: Yes! Basic and Premium plans include custom domain support. You can connect your own domain (e.g., menu.yourrestaurant.com) to your Catalog Studio menu for a more professional, branded experience.

needApp.question: Do customers need to download an app?
needApp.answer: No! That's one of the best features of Catalog Studio. Your digital menu is a web-based application accessible through any web browser. Customers simply scan your QR code or visit your URL - no downloads or installations required.

templates.question: Can I customize how my menu looks?
templates.answer: Absolutely! We offer professionally designed templates that you can customize with your brand colors, fonts, and logo. The number of available templates depends on your plan, with Premium subscribers getting access to all 25+ templates and custom theme options.

imageUpload.question: What image quality can I upload?
imageUpload.answer: Image quality varies by plan. The Free plan supports 720p images, Basic plan supports 1080p HD images, and Premium plan supports 4K Ultra HD images. We automatically optimize images for fast loading while maintaining quality.

dataBackup.question: Is my data backed up and secure?
dataBackup.answer: Yes! We use enterprise-grade security and automatic backups to protect your data. All information is stored securely with encryption, and we perform regular backups. You also have access to your data exports at any time.

getHelp.question: How do I get help if I have issues?
getHelp.answer: We offer multiple support channels: email support for all plans (support typically responds within 2-4 hours during business hours), priority support for Basic and Premium customers, comprehensive documentation, video tutorials, and you can always contact us through our contact page.

trainingAvailable.question: Is training available?
trainingAvailable.answer: Yes! We provide extensive documentation and video tutorials to help you get started. Premium plan subscribers can also schedule personalized training sessions and demos. Our platform is designed to be intuitive, so most users can get started in minutes.

setupHelp.question: Can you help me set up my menu?
setupHelp.answer: Of course! While our platform is designed to be easy to use, we're happy to help. Contact our support team, and we can guide you through the setup process. Premium customers can schedule a personalized onboarding session.

responseTime.question: How quickly do you respond to support requests?
responseTime.answer: We typically respond to all support requests within 2-4 hours during business hours (Monday-Friday, 9AM-6PM EET). Basic and Premium plan customers receive priority support with even faster response times.

stillQuestions.title: Still have questions?
stillQuestions.subtitle: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Our support team is here to help.

cta.title: Create your digital menu today
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of restaurants creating beautiful menus with Catalog Studio

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Terms and conditions for using Catalog Studio services.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: These Terms of Service govern your use of {appName} and provide information about the {appName} Service. By using our Service, you agree to these terms.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content1: By accessing and using Catalog Studio, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing this site.
acceptance.content2: Your continued use of the Service will constitute your acceptance of any changes to these terms.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
definitions.intro: For the purposes of these Terms:

service.definition: refers to Catalog Studio's digital menu platform and all associated features, applications, and services.

user.definition: refers to any individual or entity that creates an account and uses our Service.

content.definition: refers to all text, images, data, and other materials that you upload or submit to the Service.

account.definition: refers to the unique account created for you to access our Service.

account.title: 3. Account Registration and Security
account.content1: To use certain features of the Service, you must register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process and to update such information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
account.content2: You are responsible for safeguarding your account password and for any activities or actions under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to or use of your account.
account.content3: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if any information provided proves to be inaccurate, false, or misleading.

subscription.title: 4. Subscription and Payments
subscription.content1: Certain features of the Service require a paid subscription. By subscribing to a paid plan, you agree to pay the fees specified for that plan. All fees are exclusive of applicable taxes unless otherwise stated.
subscription.content2: Subscriptions automatically renew at the end of each billing cycle unless canceled before the renewal date. You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings.
subscription.content3: We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. Refund requests must be made within 14 days of the initial purchase.

usage.title: 5. Acceptable Use Policy
usage.intro: You agree not to use the Service to:
usage.rule1: Violate any applicable laws or regulations
usage.rule2: Infringe upon the intellectual property rights of others
usage.rule3: Upload or distribute viruses, malware, or any other malicious code
usage.rule4: Engage in any activity that could harm, disable, or impair the Service
usage.rule5: Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any portion of the Service or other accounts

content.title: 6. User Content and Ownership
content.content1: You retain all rights to the content you upload to the Service, including menu items, images, descriptions, and restaurant information. By uploading content, you grant us a license to use, store, and display your content solely for the purpose of providing the Service to you.
content.content2: You represent and warrant that you have all necessary rights to the content you upload and that your content does not violate any third-party rights or applicable laws.
content.content3: We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these Terms or is otherwise objectionable at our sole discretion.

intellectual.title: 7. Intellectual Property Rights
intellectual.content1: The Service and its original content (excluding User Content), features, and functionality are owned by Catalog Studio and are protected by international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property laws.
intellectual.content2: You may not copy, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any of the material on our Service, except as generally and ordinarily permitted through the Service for your personal, non-commercial use.

termination.title: 8. Termination
termination.content1: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including if you breach these Terms.
termination.content2: Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease. All provisions of these Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive, including ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, and limitations of liability.

disclaimers.title: 9. Disclaimers and Warranties
disclaimers.content1: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied.
disclaimers.content2: We do not warrant that the Service will be uninterrupted, secure, or error-free, that defects will be corrected, or that the Service or the server that makes it available are free of viruses or other harmful components.

limitation.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content1: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Catalog Studio shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues, whether incurred directly or indirectly, or any loss of data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
limitation.content2: Our total liability to you for all claims arising from or relating to the Service shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve (12) months preceding the claim.

changes.title: 11. Changes to Terms
changes.content1: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.content2: Your continued use of the Service after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At {appName}, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: This Privacy Policy applies to all information collected through our Service and explains what information we collect about you and why, how we use it, and how you can update, manage, export, and delete your information.
introduction.content2: By using our Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this Privacy Policy.

provided.title: Information You Provide to Us
provided.content: We collect information that you voluntarily provide to us when you:
provided.item1: Register for an account and create a profile
provided.item2: Upload menu items, images, and restaurant information
provided.item3: Subscribe to a paid plan and provide payment information
provided.item4: Contact us for support or send us communications

automatic.title: Information Automatically Collected
automatic.content: When you use our Service, we automatically collect certain information, including:
automatic.item1: Log data (IP address, browser type, pages visited, time spent)
automatic.item2: Device information (device type, operating system, unique identifiers)
automatic.item3: Usage data (features used, actions taken, frequency of use)

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.intro: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
usage.purpose1: To provide, maintain, and improve our Service
usage.purpose2: To process your transactions and manage your subscription
usage.purpose3: To send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
usage.purpose4: To respond to your comments, questions, and customer service requests
usage.purpose5: To monitor and analyze trends, usage, and activities in connection with our Service
usage.purpose6: To detect, prevent, and address technical issues and security threats

sharing.title: 4. How We Share Your Information
sharing.content1: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information in the following circumstances:

service.description: We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data hosting, and analytics.

legal.description: We may disclose your information if required by law or if we believe that such action is necessary to comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.

business.description: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred as part of that transaction.

consent.description: We may share your information for any other purpose with your consent.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our Service and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device.
cookies.content2: We use the following types of cookies:

essential.description: Required for the Service to function properly, such as authentication and security.

preference.description: Remember your settings and preferences, such as language selection.

analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use our Service and improve user experience.

security.title: 6. Data Security
security.content1: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. This includes encryption of data in transit and at rest, regular security assessments, and access controls.
security.content2: However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

retention.title: 7. Data Retention
retention.content1: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required or permitted by law.
retention.content2: When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information within a reasonable timeframe, except where we are required to retain it for legal or legitimate business purposes.

rights.title: 8. Your Privacy Rights
rights.intro: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information:

access.description: You can request access to the personal information we hold about you.

correction.description: You can request that we correct inaccurate or incomplete information.

deletion.description: You can request that we delete your personal information.

portability.description: You can request a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

objection.description: You can object to our processing of your personal information in certain circumstances.

rights.exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

children.title: 9. Children's Privacy
children.content1: Our Service is not intended for children under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 16. If you are a parent or guardian and believe that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us.
children.content2: If we become aware that we have collected personal information from children without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.content1: Your information may be transferred to and maintained on servers located outside of your country, where data protection laws may differ from those in your jurisdiction.
international.content2: By using our Service, you consent to the transfer of your information to countries outside of your country of residence, which may have different data protection rules.

changes.title: 11. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal, operational, or regulatory reasons. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.content2: Your continued use of the Service after any changes to this Privacy Policy constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: 12. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
